html:
11.3.20  5:27 pm   Why do you use bright colors in your videos?

      perhaps i've been irresponsible

11.3.20  4:55 pm   Hey Bill, I'm learning music theory and we're supposed to memorize intervals, but I can't find a way to help me remember the minor 7th. I don't know any songs that sound like that and it's very weird sounding. I could just remember it being "that one I don't know,"  but I'd prefer a more practical method of remembering it. Any tips?

      i think you would be better off getting to know it as a 2nd. jump an octave, then go a 2nd back the other way

11.3.20  3:31 pm   How long do you think it will take for your next video?

      i have a new company policy which says videos should only take a reasonable amount of time

11.3.20  1:54 pm   Are you still making songs?

     yes

     Also can I become a guitar?

      almost

11.3.20  1:18 pm   how far along are you with the video?

      pretty far

11.3.20  12:50 pm   How did the duck that asked "steve" (in the hi im steve video) "how did you climb that mountain?" If the duck had to get up the mountain to give "steve" the letter?????

      i didn't think it was a duck, but, it's a mail deliverer. it says "here's the mail". so that question is not from the duck (bird), the duck (bird) is just the messanger

11.3.20  11:32 am   What is your opinion on water?

      it's pretty good

11.3.20  11:21 am   I'm in a musical/creative rut right now. Tips on how to get out of it?

      try creating at least 3 things that are not music

11.3.20  11:14 am   Are you making a video right now?

      yes

11.3.20  11:00 am   which animal is your most favorite?

      regular

11.3.20  10:47 am   i want to learn songs i like in order to make songs (instrumentals) i like more. how do you learn a song? do you re-create it with your computer? do you learn to play all the parts on your instruments? do you transcribe it? something else?

     it can work any of those ways. do it in the type of way you want to make the music. from what you said first, it sounds like you already have a format in mind

     thanks for reading, and for answering if you do

11.3.20  10:26 am   Can you do any impressions?

      sometimes i try to impersonate planet earth but it's very hit or miss

11.3.20  10:16 am   What is the exact day you will make your next video

      this might not be what you want to hear, but sometimes it takes more than 1 day

11.3.20  10:11 am   what inspired you to make videos?

     every moment, it seems

     also love your videos

11.3.20  10:00 am   is writing the most important thing to do in order to organize my ideas and figure out what i want and is there any other way

      everyone does it differently. some people are comfortable just letting the best ideas rise to the top, and forget about the rest. while others may be paranoid of losing any, thinking that any idea can be good

11.3.20  9:58 am   What is your opinion on earthworms?

      they're pretty good

11.3.20  9:49 am   Why do fruits exist?

      to make the world a better place

11.3.20  9:44 am   do you think history textbooks depict historical events accurately

      they can if they want

11.3.20  9:42 am   Do you still use anything you learned in Middle School/Junior High?

      yes, i still draw palm trees the same way as i did then

11.3.20  9:41 am   Are u actually trying to learn 3D animation?

      yes

11.3.20  9:11 am   Who or what is your inspiration when it comes to writing music?

     everything is potentially in play

     Is it everything you see in general then you apply your experiences and let it flow like water?

     yes, or sometimes even just let the water flow without consideration of anything i may think i've seen

      I'm often told that music is free and I've always took my grandpa's words that "music is a vessel that can only shine when you put your soul in it". And I believe that your works, they are made with your own soul. I believe that you've put yourself into those. Here's my last question: I've forgotten how to play guitar by now and my voice is now coarse. Do you think I'll be able to come back to music again?

      sure

11.3.20  8:33 am   Do you prefer making songs or random videos like hi im steve?

      i'm looking for ways to combine the two

11.3.20  8:22 am   I wonder how do you come up with lyrics for your songs

     i do it musically

     and which song was the most difficult to make

     i'm not sure. the difficult part is never at the actual moment when the song is being written. so i don't know if that part counts

11.3.20  8:04 am   Can you end covid please?

     i will try

      Thanks

11.3.20  8:00 am   When r u making a video again?

      right away, but that's not the whole story. i will also be making many more videos immediately after that

11.3.20  7:55 am   Bill Wurtz, do you plan to make another video soon?

      yes but i'm going to finish the one i'm working on first

11.3.20  7:34 am   Did the Mechanical Pencil from "a Play featuring an iphone power block and a mechanical pencil" vote in the next election?

      no

11.3.20  6:38 am   How are your songs so dumb yet so smart?

      they are of average intelligence, which can make a good role play depending on which side you feel like playing on any particular day

11.3.20  5:23 am   How did you come up with your unique style of music and videos?

      first i imagine 10,000 ways i wish it could be. then i realize all those ways are impossible for me to do. then after a brief moment of despair, i am sometimes able to find 1 way that is possible. and then i do it that way

11.3.20  4:45 am   how does leap month works? do month just grow legs and jump????

      it's more like teleporting. but, i should mention that the februarys called 'leap month' are, deceptively, the only ones which actually do NOT leap, over february 29th

11.3.20  3:20 am   What happens when a square turns into a triangle?

      2 vertices are merged, and their connecting line dissolved

11.3.20  2:35 am   what keeps you up at night?

      sleeping during the day

11.3.20  1:49 am   How did you get so smart and articulate?

      ,nightmares,

11.3.20  12:12 am   Do lyrics really need to make sense?

      try it and see

11.3.20  12:08 am   what's your inspiration?

      the time space continuum

11.2.20  11:16 pm   whats your favorite song you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.2.20  11:07 pm   Why do people start wars?

      they didn't do it, it's always the other person's fault

11.2.20  9:41 pm   do you have any productivity tips

      yes. tip 1, what are you producing

11.2.20  8:10 pm   Are there any current/new musicians that inspire or amaze you?

     everyone inspires and amazes me, let's just get that out in the open

     Does other people's music ever motivate you?

     yes, i should mention that everything also motivates me

11.2.20  7:57 pm   My friend wantts to grow up to be a paleontologist but his mother said that wouldn't support him and his family when he grows up so he feels really fed up and doesn't know what to do with life. What do you suggest?

      make an album, or maybe some pamphlets. maybe package the two together, into an album-pamphlet combo package

11.2.20  6:56 pm   Do you like geography?

      yes

11.2.20  6:47 pm   Do you like maps?

      yes

11.2.20  6:05 pm   thoughts on grass?

      the most relaxing thing is that you don't have to actually count the individual strands for them all to be there

11.2.20  5:26 pm   what was the bad thing you did?

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

11.2.20  5:21 pm   When will your new music be released?

      on a regular ass basis. or, ass regular if you live in the southern hemisphere

11.2.20  4:59 pm   Do you believe that there can be non-personal-appreciation value in art at all? By that I mean, is the mona lisa better than a five year's old drawing entirely from the perspective of every person that thinks that way or is there something more than just "that's the opinion of many people"? I used to think that stuff like beethoven is in a very real way more valuable than for example a high school band's music, but now I'm starting to think that it's really all just an opinion, and maybe aliens will find the school's band work more impressive or something like that. What are your thoughts?

      if you're looking for something impressive, i was going to ask you if you had seen..............sports

11.2.20  4:41 pm   Is Wyoming real?

      yes, but i can't prove it right now

11.2.20  3:53 pm   Is there a hidden meaning behind your videos?

      there is meaning on both sides as well as inside the video

11.2.20  3:32 pm   what is ur favorite intrument and why is it bass?

      it would be because the recording/arrangement at hand is fully complete, except for the bass not having been done yet

11.2.20  2:22 pm   What is a song that is important to you?

      all of them are
